channel.title: Spec problem
channel.description:
I try to spec with dragon claws , ags , and vls , idk if other items aswell but as i do this error pops up and spams it a few times , and i cant seem to fix it.. Please someone help me! :(
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ILaMpvn.jpg[/img]

item.title: Spec problem
item.dc:creator: @scar3d scar3d
item.description:
@scar3d wrote:

item.title: Spec problem
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“scar3d, post:3, topic:539843”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=658688.msg4405746#msg4405746 date=1391928921]
Show us the activateSpecial method and specifically also show like 3392 of CombatAssistant.
[/quote]

Heres the activate special method i believe

[code] c.faceUpdate(i);
c.slayerHelmetEffect = c.playerEquipment[c.playerHat] == 15492 && c.slayerTask == i;
//c.specAccuracy = 1.0;
//c.specDamage = 1.0;
Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].underAttackBy = c.playerId;
Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].lastDamageTaken = System.currentTimeMillis();
if(c.usingSpecial && !c.usingMagic) {
if(checkSpecAmount(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon])){
c.lastWeaponUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon];
c.lastArrowUsed = c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows];
activateSpecial(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon], i);
return;
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You don’t have the required special energy to use this attack.”);
c.usingSpecial = false;
c.getItems().updateSpecialBar();
c.npcIndex = 0;
return;

[/code]
and i have no idea what a 3392 of combatassistant is? [/quote]Line 3392 in the CombatAssistant class.

Read full topic
